title: In the Pink - William Shatner and Pink Floyd
description:
IN THE PINK! William Shatner and Pink Floyd
one CD, 79:52

Early, Barrett-era Pink Floyd tracks and the William Shatner album "The Transformed Man" from 1968, together at last on one disc.

Compiled in 2005, the mastering was state-of-the-art, using the Shatner and Pink Floyd CDs available at that time.

Also includes some rare unreleased Barrett/Floyd tracks.

You can recreate "The Transformed Man" from this disc because the tracks are in the album sequence, just interspersed with Pink Floyd selections. In other words, the first track on "The Transformed Man" is King Henry V, and the last track is The Transformed Man.

You'll have lots of fun, I guarantee it!

Track Listing:

01 Scream Thy Last Scream - Pink Floyd (unreleased)
02 Matilda Mother - Pink Floyd
03 King Henry V - Elegy for the Brave - William Shatner
04 Jugband Blues - Pink Floyd
05 Theme from Cyrano - Mr. Tambourine Man - William Shatner
06 Corporal Clegg - Pink Floyd
07 Astronomy Domine - Pink Floyd
08 Hamlet - It Was a Very Good Year - William Shatner
09 Bike - Pink Floyd
10 A Saucerful of Secrets - Pink Floyd
11 Romeo and Juliet - William Shatner
12 Flaming - Pink Floyd
13 How Insensitive - William Shatner
14 Spleen - Lucy in the Sky with Diamonds - William Shatner
15 Vegetable Man - Pink Floyd (unreleased)
16 Lucifer Sam - Pink Floyd
17 The Transformed Man - William Shatner
